subject: AI & Agents
title: Chunking: Smaller Isn't Always Better
description: One-minute skill: Chunking: Smaller Isn't Always Better.

hook.text: Your search returns tiny fragments that lose meaning. Chunking is the culprit.

buildup.text: Chunks that are too small lack context. Too big and retrieval gets noisy.

discovery.text: Chunk by idea: headings, paragraphs, code blocks. Add overlap if needed.

twist.text: The best chunk size depends on question style, not document length.
